text: Juan Daniel Cardellino de San Vicente (March 4, 1942 - September 8, 2007) was a football (soccer) referee from Uruguay, who officiated at two FIFA World Cups: 1982 (two matches) and 1990 (one match). ==References== * Profile Category:1942 births Category:Uruguayan football referees Category:FIFA World Cup referees Category:1990 FIFA World Cup referees Category:Copa América referees Category:Olympic football referees Category:Place of birth missing Category:2007 deaths Category:1982 FIFA World Cup referees
title: Juan Daniel Cardellino
